Our Story

We were just 20 when we got married. By 24, we had five beautiful children. It's been a journey—a whirlwind of growth, laughter, tears, and lessons we never saw coming.

Our love has never been better, but it didn't happen overnight. We've spent years working, failing, learning, and trying again.

If you're married, engaged, or just dating, we invite you to join us on this journey. Let's grow together.

"A woman will know when a guy is really into her. She will know, and if she doesn't, she's lying to herself."
— Garrett
"Listen to understand and let the other one know when you don't understand something, you have to communicate."
— Jackie
